message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be valuable to you. I am offering this exceptional item for $15000. I hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it would bring to me.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. I understand your perspective, but I must respectfully decline your offer. I am unable to lower the price below $14000 due to the high value and quality of the product. I look forward to potentially revisiting this opportunity if the price aligns more closely with our valuation.
I understand your product is of high value, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $14000 to me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $13000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value and unique features of our product, I am unable to accept your offer at $13000. I am proposing a counteroffer of $13500. This price reflects the product's quality and the benefits it provides. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our positions.
I understand the product has unique features, but I'm still not convinced it's worth the high price. I'm willing to meet you at $12800. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. I am willing to consider a price of $13200 for our product. This price still reflects its value and quality, while remaining competitive with your offer. I hope this proposal allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $12900. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I appreciate your offer, and I am willing to accept a price of $13000 for our product. I believe this price reflects the value and quality of the item, while also accommodating your budget considerations. I hope this proposal helps us conclude this transaction satisfactorily.
